file.path: D:\TORRENT\________COMPLETED\Epub Collection#8(32Skulls)\Jessica Caspian - Along Came a Tiger (epub).epub
file.name: Jessica Caspian - Along Came a Tiger (epub).epub

tika.dc.description:
A powerful tribe leader

Sanura Merchant is - stubborn, capable and determined to protect the rest of her pack in the Serengeti. All of her decisions are based on what is best for her tribe, her friends and family. Now it is time for her to find a mate to lead with and continue her family line.

Strong, fast, and ruthless shifters

But this is no ordinary congregation of people living in the forests. This pack is comprised entirely of weretigers –who won’t stand for any threat to their home. Sanura is no exception, a tiger shapeshifter who won’t let anyone get in the way of her freedom or interfere with her tiger magic. At least, that was what she had always thought.

A handsome ladies’ man and avid hunter

Flynn Jacobs stumbles into Sanura’s world purely by chance. As soon as the two meet, he realises that fate brought him to this area populated by tigers, where a lone woman seems to run free. His old vows against a monogamous relationship disappear in the wind, and he is determined to find his beautiful new love again, to spend the rest of his life with her. That is, if he could ever find out anything about her. Completely unaware that his new love is a tiger shapeshifter, he continues to hunt in the area, putting himself in more danger than he could ever have known.

But Kazim is in love with the esteemed leader too

Sanura has sworn to be his mate for life. No humans, she told him. She can’t stand to be with a human. And there she is, running off into the forest toward a man who wants to destroy their pack. He can offer her all the steamy sex stories she wants, but her affections are elsewhere.
While Kazim won’t admit it to anyone else, their relationship is not purely political and practical to him. This tiger shifter romance is his reality, and has been for a long time. He yearns for her touch again and again, but no matter how he hints and dreams, or pleads, she doesn’t share his feelings. But Kazim is in love, and fiercely protective by nature. He is in hot pursuit of his love, and will destroy anyone who gets in the way of his dream BBW romance and hot shifter erotica.

Little do they know

A third set of eyes is watching Sanura, in the form of her best friend Samira. Samira has loved Sanura for as long as she can remember, and she isn’t willing to give her up without a fight. She watches over the leader in silence, eyeing her every move. So when Sanura meets this hunter in the forest, how can she bear to keep her thoughts and feelings to herself anymore? Can she really keep this huge secret, just hoping the steamy sex stories she has dreamed about will become a reality? She has loved Sanura since they were just children, and her fantasies of beginning a BBW romance with the woman are quickly slipping out of her grasp.

Sanura has some tough decisions to make

She can abandon her pack and run away with Flynn in silence, but she would have to abandon her tiger magic and her dreams of shifter erotica, along with the home she has always loved. She could stay in her home and sacrifice the man she craves, settling for her sworn mate or her best friend, who are both in hot pursuit of her love. A sexy tiger shifter romance is what she has always wanted, after all. But it seems her needs have changed, and Flynn won’t leave her mind. Can a stubborn weretiger like Sanura, so used to running free in the wild, ever really live in harmony with a human like Flynn, who hunts her kind for sport with no sense of remorse?

Please purchase this 10,169 word story and follow Sanura’s heart breaking dilemma as she is forced to choose between love for her home and pack, or love for the dangerous hunter she can’t stop thinking and dreaming about.

Romantic Erotica
